channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)

item.title: CVE-2020-4371|2024-08-04T08:00:07.312Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 contains sensitive information in leftover debug code that could be used aid a local user in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 179008.

item.title: CVE-2020-4400|2024-08-04T08:00:07.174Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 179478.

item.title: CVE-2020-4397|2024-08-04T08:00:06.992Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 transmits sensitive information in plain text which could be obtained by an attacker using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 179428.

item.title: CVE-2020-4369|2024-08-04T08:00:07.842Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 stores highly sensitive information in cleartext that could be obtained by a user. IBM X-Force ID: 179004.

item.title: CVE-2020-4372|2024-08-04T08:00:07.203Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 179009

item.title: CVE-2020-4399|2024-08-04T08:00:06.943Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 could allow an authenticated user to send malformed requests to cause a denial of service against the server. IBM X-Force ID: 179476.

item.title: CVE-2020-4405|2024-08-04T08:00:07.617Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 could disclose potentially sensitive information to an authenticated user due to world readable log files. IBM X-Force ID: 179484.

item.title: CVE-2020-4385|2024-08-04T08:00:07.443Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 179266.
